name: Die Trying (addbue)
description:
Scolded, mocked, and tricked. Play as a survivor trying to escape the grasp of the evil director's rule. As the survivor, you will consistently fall for the director's evil tricks, lies, and scares. However, it is up to you to control the game, and take over his evil schemes. Unlock secret rooms and solve mysterious puzzles, as you escape to the secret basement of the forest to uncover who the evil director truly is. 

Please note, this is the first game I have made myself that I have self-published onto itch.io or any platform, so please give me constructive criticism and review so I can develop better games for you in the future. :)

Did this under a challenge for my school, where I had to make a fully playable game in a week, where the only way for the player to progress is by dying. Built from Unreal Engine 4.
